apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts a tender moment between two men, with one leaning in for a kiss while the other's eyes are closed in affection, both rendered with medium-light and medium skin tones respectively. Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and soft rounded edges lend a gentle, loving quality to their features, enhanced by subtle, realistic lighting that highlights their tender expressions. This emoji beautifully captures a romantic gesture, symbolizing love, intimacy, and partnership in digital conversations across Appleâ€™s ecosystem.
